nodes.text: Gordan was the king of the planet Kheedar. An Imperial supporter who always considered Kheedar an Imperial holding, he was also senile. When the Empire arrived at Kheedar and declared martial law, he defied their approach in his senility and swore to fight. The Victory-class Star Destroyer Pestage used TIE/LN starfighters and concussion missiles to cow the planet and forced the world's surrender inside forty minutes.
